DOC.brief_title: Provoked , Localized Vulvodynia Treatment With Acupuncture Lidocaine Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control , single-blinded , pilot trial study feasibility acceptability acupuncture 5 % lidocaine . Patients recruit patient population Oregon Health & Science University Vulvar Health Clinic . Thirty ( 30 ) patient PLV enrol study participant study . Fifteen ( 15 ) allocate treatment ( classical ) acupuncture + 5 % lidocaine group fifteen ( 15 ) allocate control ( non-classical ) acupuncture + 5 % lidocaine group via computer generate randomization program balance allocation base four variable : pain intensity , smoke status , body mass index , pain duration . The acupuncturist interview patient perform exam pulse tongue . A standardized acupuncture treatment assign , group receive 18 acupuncture treatment follow standardize protocol classical non-classical acupuncture point , without mild electrical stimulation . All study participant self-apply lidocaine cream genital region four time daily study .
DOC.criteria: Literate , English speaking , premenopausal , woman meet Friedrich 's criterion Provoked , localize vulvodynia Reported introital dyspareunia longer three month duration ; Average pain score great 4 Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) enrollment cotton swab test Tampon Test ; Able insert Original Regular Tampaxâ„¢ tampon . Coexisting condition lead dyspareunia include generalize unprovoked vulvodynia , atrophic vaginitis , vulvovaginal dermatosis ( e.g . lichen sclerosus ) , genital infection ( e.g . herpes simplex virus yeast infection ) . Pregnant postpartum breastfeeding ; Use neuromodulator medication ( e.g . Serotonin Norepinephrine Reuptake Inhibitors ( SNRIs ) , Tricyclic Antidepressants , antiseizure medication ) start last six month . If take longer , must stable dose least six month still report moderate severe pain . Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors ( SSRIs ) allow ; Postmenopausal define surgical natural menopause ( menses 12 month ) ; Chronic pelvic pain defined daily , nonmenstrual pain pelvis low abdomen longer three month duration ; Must able refrain treatment PLV include nontraditional option ( e.g . medication , physical therapy , sex therapy , acupuncture , naturopathic remedy ) course study ( 6 month ) . Use SNRIs , lidocaine , acupuncture within last three month .
